name: Player Manager
description:
Back of Jewel Case - PlayStation (Europe) (from Ad Blurbs)

Player Manager is a football management simulation of unparalelled depth. Featuring all four divisions, promotion and relegation, domestic and European cup competitions, it is the perfect introduction to the world of soccer management. Together with its volatile transfer market, fickle fans and temperamental players it contains all the pressures of sport's toughest profession. This is the definitive management experience.
